title: Train simulation Template
description: After preparing the necessary parts of the train, wagon, ropeway and miner's cars, you can integrate them into the plan within 10-15 minutes
longDescription:
Major update coming soon for 5.0 and above!

The new version will be published in December after the documents are prepared.


Replicate system added

Now you can use the train at any speed you want without any problems.

The connection of wagons to each other has been made stable

Settings section has been grouped in a more understandable way.

Automatic gear display added.

Added automatic speed reduction of the train in Pawn mode.

Easy spline changing feature added.

The feature of the train stopping only at defined stations has been added.

Added crash system with ground bombs.

Improved the character's interaction with the train.

Added Automatic and Random spline switching.

Unlimited cameras can be added.

All other features will be listed with the new version.


Attention, for large projects, please wait for the new version to be released.



Attention! There is only the blueprint template system.

Trains, Environment, effects and music seen in the pictures are not included in the content.


After preparing the parts of any train, you can integrate it into the template in a few minutes.


You can add as many trains and wagons as you want by duplicating a single actor file.

Since it is created with a Simple Plan, you can develop or modify the plan file.


3 different train intros applied to the template as an example

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TqsSXcV7OZs

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NOlHxmjlqFM

Free VFX package used:

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/m5-vfx-vol2-fire-and-flames


Train products used as an example;

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/train-yard

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/steam-locomotive-01

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/victorian-train-station-and-railroad-modular-set


Keyboard shortcuts

0: Character camera

1 to 6 cameras

Space bar - Acceleration

Left CTRL : Slowdown

B : Brake

L : Front lights

I : Inner Lights

O : Automatic Doors

V: Wagon separation
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Train can be managed with AI, Pawn or character
  • Wagon and Idle Train options
  • Miner carts adaptable
  • Ropeway system adaptable
  • Maximum speed setting
  • Automatic stop when the track reaches the end
  • Auto loop
  • Automatic return system when the train reaches the end of the track
  • Thrust, Deceleration and Braking system
  • Slowing down and stopping when there is a character or other train in front of the train
  • Station system, AI system stops at automatic stations
  • Automatic and Manual Door can be added
  • Lighting Can Be Added
  • Manual and Automatic rail changing system
  • Manual or Automatic wagon holding
  • Train crash system
  • When the rail is finished it can fall off a cliff
  • Smoke and Fire effects can be added
  • Static or Skeletal Animated wheel can be added
  • Even if you cannot align the train exactly on the rail, it will automatically align itself on the rail when it is started.


Number of Blueprints:

2 master blueprint file

16 additional BP files for rail, widget and lights (You can create your own BP files if you wish)


Supported Development Platforms:

   Windows: Yes

   Mac: Unknown


Documentation:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TqsSXcV7OZs&list=PL83GyhfD6TesKkDAd0QCV9ctpNXytOPe9


Important/Additional Notes:

There is only the blueprint template system.

The trains, effects and music seen in the pictures are not included in the content.
